article_title: Most health system mergers don't meet expectations — Will Lancaster General Health and U. Penn be different?
article_text: More in Lancaster General Health Merger With the University of Pennsylvania Health System: Everything You Need to Know (9 of 29)

og.description: Hundreds of U.S. health systems have merged in recent years, but "the benefits have been elusive," health economist Martin Gaynor said.
